author: manolito
msg: optimized local value handling, so that getValue of UIData is only called when needed

author: manolito
msg: optimized saving of descendant states: isAllChildrenAndFacetsValid loop no longer needed

author: manolito
msg: (re)set to valid on decode, so that component automatically gets (re)validated

author: manolito
msg: saveSerializedView now caches the SerializedView within the request, so that multiple calls only process the saveState methods of components once.
